title: Competency-Based Learning Experience Analysis for Social Studies Curriculum Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Studies Knowledge and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Social studies competency enhancement program for in-service elementary teachers, developing classroom-applicable skills through activity-based learning and self-reflection interviews

learning_goals: Learners can explain the knowledge construction process through situational activity analysis.
Learners can evaluate the impact of learning tools (artefacts) on competency development.
Learners can systematically reflect on their learning experiences through self-confrontation interviews.
Learners can propose strategies for applying competency-based instructional design principles to actual classes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
